text:
@EricTrump Economy in tatters? 
Coronavirus’s fault
Coronavirus deaths?
China’s fault
Trillions in debt?
Democrats fault
Can’t go outside?
Governors fault
Mueller finding evidence of conspiracy?
Obama’s fault
Getting impeached?
Media’s fault

What’s trump done? 
Besides blame everyone else?
